name: lucky-chant
effect: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.
short_effect: Prevents the target from scoring critical hits for five turns.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits for five turns.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits for five turns.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits for five turns.
